Mazoon

An Elfish man originally from Hapeston, Mazoon trained as a bard and traveled around Ensulasia performing in many different venues. Since the Civil War however, Mazoon tends to stick to performing in inns and buildings closer to his hometown in the south west. He is generally oblivious to the politics which caused the war but has found his “pro-empire” songs to not go down to well when he ventures further nowadays (see emptyLink - link to song). His most common spot for performing is The Grey Dog in Tharmouth.
